title: The Man Who Transformed Flying Finally Gets His Spirit-Frontier Deal
sub_head: William Franke, Frontier’s chairman, helped popularize the ultra-low-cost airline model in the U.S. and around the world
body:
Nearly a decade ago, William Franke, then the chairman of Spirit Airlines Inc., proposed that Spirit join his investment firm in a deal to buy Frontier Airlines .
On Monday, Frontier—where Mr. Franke is now chairman—announced a $2.9 billion deal to buy Spirit.
